name: Strategeist
description: Strategeist is a grand strategy game in which you take on the mantle of a national spirit and guide a nation through time to build an empire and secure your place in history. Starting in the year 1206, at the beginning of the Mongol Invasions, you will pick one of over a thousand countries and attempt to forge a new destiny by making strategic decisions about diplomacy, technology, economy, internal politics, and war.

name: Bee Aware!
description: Bee Aware! Not just another Bee Game! Help the bees get rid of all the bad, bad industrialists on every continent with the use of bags of biological pest control. Earn these bags by playing seven minigames. Games that will surely fit the needs of every casual gamer!

name: Dance Collider
description: Dance Collider is the ultimate dance and rhythm game for VR. Dance-off against eight unique characters each with their own music and dance style.

name: Hordiaz
description:
Hordiaz is a combination of survival, simulator and role-playing. Explore the magical lands of Solinia, surrounded
by dangers, adventures, secrets and deities.

name: Matchville
description: Matchville is a beautiful town where everyone can find a job that suits them. Complete three-in-a-row levels to advance the plot, make new friends and decorate picturesque locations. Your own cafe is already waiting for you!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - FollowHD
description: With this addon you can watch your aircraft wing its way across a moving map. Follow the flight line, see where you are, at all times.

name: Block Tricks
description: Sin descripción

name: Wheelbarrow Warrior
description: Steam's Pre-Eminent Wheelbarrow game. Defeat unique enemies. Execute insane wheelbarrow abilities. Solve complex bosses. Become the Wheelbarrow Warrior.

name: Shipbreakers
description: Tear apart the seven seas in this fast paced arcade shooter and cover the abyss with the wrecks of your enemies. Hire vicious sea wolfs as your crew members and board other ships to unlock crazy weapons and become the fiercest pirate of this little planet.

name: ElectricVLab
description: ElectricVLab employs the technology of video games to explore the fascinating world of electricity and electronics. It allows you to build a wide variety of analog and digital electronic circuits, and observe their behavior in a visually rich, informative, fun environment.

name: Hinedere Beat
description: Hinedere Beat is a pseudo 8-bit, quasi-cinematic platformer with minor stealth elements and visual novel-style storytelling. Much of the platforming is parkour-influenced, progression is linear, and its story is one of cynicism.

name: Hellfront: Honeymoon
description: Hellfront: Honeymoon is an intense twin stick action strategy game, to be enjoyed with friends over a six-pack of fruit juice. One screen, one winner. Welcome to the Hellfront.

name: Operation Osam Bin Laden
description: Upon discovering the location of the Al-Qaeda leader in exile, the US army sends their best commandos to northern Pakistan. Take control of these commandos, send them behind enemy territories on a hazardous mission, and bring them back alive.

name: Tony Slopes
description: Jump into the wonderful world of Tony Slopes and race a whole host of utterly ridiculous and outlandish vehicles down some of the most treacherous and unpredictable terrains. With a variety of fun-filled, themed races to compete on, multiple vehicles and headpieces to try out, Tony Slopes is bound to keep you and your friends entertained for hours on end!

name: The Land of the Seazogs
description: Professor Meme, a leading 164-year-old genetic science expert, receives a mysterious request for help from his old friend Gustav, the head of Zerulia's animal research base, an inhospitable planet inhabited by ancient aquatic creatures: the Seazogs. Meme soon discovers that something very disturbing is happening there, and that his intervention will be necessary to solve a problem of unimaginable scope ...

name: Echoes III
description: Echoes is back with a bang and in 3D! More intense and eye bleeding than before, with the action coming at you from the sides, above and below.

name: JumpStream
description: JumpStream is a competitive platformer built in real-time by an audience, using Mixer Interactive! The goal is to work with your audience to construct an emergent path to complete challenges in the fastest possible time.

name: Obliteracy
description: Obliteracy is a word game set in a utopian future where energy is generated from language itself. Word-warriors pilot enormous mechanized robots in a tournament to prove themselves worthy of the title of Champion and to earn the chance to craft the future of the world.

name: Welcome Back to 2007 2
description: Would you say that 2007 cannot be returned? After 11 long years, 2007 are coming back to us in 2018! AGAIN! Be ready for Cool Story! WBT2007 2 is a old-school platformer game.

name: Robo Runners
description: Run for your life, the robots are coming! The fast paced multiplayer game pits you against a number of other human contestants for the chance of survival.

name: All-Star Troopers
description: Sin descripción

name: 修真风云录
description: Sin descripción

name: 什么鬼暗黑
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Cannons+
description: Color Cannons+ is a fast paced, shooting, shoving, and blasting local multiplayer game for up to 4 players. Play across 10 maps, each with a unique and original soundtrack.

name: Space Farm
description: SpaceFarm is following in the footsteps amazing games like Stardew Valley, and any of the Harvest Moon franchise. We are setting out to bring this amazing genre into the next generation. In-depth questing, rewards, leveling, items, battles, mini games, and of course FARMING!

name: Fluffy Horde
description: Fluffy Horde is a 2D side-scrolling hybrid between real-time strategy and tower defense. The game revolves around a magical hyper-breeding bunny horde created by a misunderstood Shaman wanderer.

name: Mutual Secret
description: In Mutual Secret, follow the story of Emica, just young divorced mother of two twins Chloe and Tina. Every year on St.Valentines day she finds new valentine from an anonym in her bag. This time she wants to find out who is this stranger.

name: Tank Souls
description: A fun souls-like game in which you will kill your time in hundreds of dungeons, pumping your skills and knocking out randomly-generated things.

name: Resynth
description: Relax, remix and restore with Resynth, a minimal musical puzzler.

name: Infinity Tank Battle
description: Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements.

name: Civil War: 1863 Gold
description:
Civil War: 1863 Gold contains all the campaigns and downloadable content from the original game with no in-app purchases.
Relive iconic battles of the American Civil War. Take command of both the Union and Confederate forces in this exciting turn-based strategy game from the developers behind the international top-selling Tank Battle: 1944 and Ancient Battle: Rome.
New features for version 2.0 include combat analysis, strategic movement, map zoom and combat improvements.

name: Itsy Blitzy
description: Itsy Blitzy is an arcade style bullet hell brawler. The game focuses on simple-yet-deep combat with fluid controls, and a "so hard it's meditative" difficulty level.

name: Rocket Hippo!
description: Sin descripción

name: Secret of the Lost Cavern
description: Sin descripción

name: The Goracle
description: Classic RPG Dungeon Crawler. Save the kingdom from the creature of the great abyss.

name: Allergenium
description: Allergenium it’s not a typical survival game. The world created has a unique aspect which has destroyed most of the humanity. You're one of the few who survived the new face of destruction – ALLERGY!

name: The Adventures of Captain Potato
description: Potato, a young hamster, grew up dreaming of becoming a hero. When his village is suddenly invaded by the Queen's army and his friends are captured, he must journey into an increasingly corrupt land with his friend Julius, help those in need, fight to rescue his friends and save his realm!

name: Funky Karts
description: Play the nonstop platform roller!

name: Mad Restaurant People
description: That's your new job as a waiter in a nutshell: Serve customers, make no mistakes and be quick about it!

name: Solar Explorer: New Dawn
description: Solar Explorer: New Dawn is a modern take on a classic physics based Lunar Lander arcade video game. Master the challenges that the worlds of the Inner Solar System pose and help humanity become a space-faring species!

name: Somnium Space
description: We are creating an Open, Social, Virtual Reality world. A world with its own economy and its own currency. A VR world with its own Marketplace, Games, Social experiences and Virtual Land ownership. A VR world which is fully interconnected and seamless. Fully accessible from any device from 2D mode on a user’s Desktop to fully immersive VR mode on a user’s Desktop or Mobile.

name: 霎时晴荫
description: Sin descripción

name: Seven Sacrifices
description: Seven girls came to a mountain villa on the outskirts to attend a party. Suddenly they were struck by a storm. They were trapped and lost contact with the outside world. Everyone was caught unawares by the accident, but the conspiracy has just begun.

name: Dimetrosaur
description: Sneak around dinosaurs and enemy soldiers in a single player story. Explore the island, find the hidden laboratory, rescue the Doctor and avoid becoming lunch in Dimetrosaur. Similar to retro games.

name: Shadow Brawlers
description: Shadow Brawlers is a local party game in which players control cute, agile ninjas that hide in the shadows. Surprise your opponents by appearing suddenly from the background; attack and disappear.

name: Mad Factory
description: WELCOME TO THE FACTORY! In Mad Factory you’re the new hire in the universe's finest cookie factory–and you’ve got orders to fill! See who can make, bake and frost the most cookies and reach the top of the leaderboard! Can you keep your cool and deliver the goods in this addictive VR experience?

name: Pool 2D - Poolians
description: Pool 2D is a free pool game including 8-ball,9-ball,15-ball,3-ball,rotation and blackjack. The graphics are spectacular and the physics are realistic and accurate. Whether you play against the computer or against real players from all over the world online, the action is smooth and fast paced!

name: JJBoom
description: A party game that makes you laugh out loud, in the local or online games, raise everything up, throw them out, use your wisdom to blow your enemies up!

name: Escape Black Orion VR
description: In Escape Black Orion you are in a mysterious facility, Black Orion. Something has gone wrong and now you are locked in the engineering bay with gas pouring into the room. Using you wits and whatever tools you can find you must disengage the door locks to escape before your air runs out.

name: Kokorogawari
description: Kokorogawari (Change of Heart) is a GxB otome human drama visual novel set in a grounded and authentic portrayal of modern-day Japan. While the two main themes are about love and the arts, Kokorogawari also explores the complexity and depth of familial relationships and emotions.

name: Temple of the Lost
description: Explore the Temple of the Lost, solve occasional puzzles, avoid deadly traps, beat the mazes and find what's hidden. Slowly uncover the secrets of this temple, while listening to ambient, atmospheric music.

name: Serenade of the Sirens
description: Serenade of the Sirens is a retro, rogue-lite, dungeon crawler. As a mermaid named Seika, discover the hidden mystery of the underwater cave.

name: Outback
description: Australia is an already harsh environment and to make things worse, the world is ending. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Moral King
description: Moral King is an interactive movie, which means you can control the protagonist during the movie. Whenever the mouse pointer is visible, you are asked. You have to decide, solve puzzles and react quickly in some places.

name: Initial 2: New Stage
description: “Initial Ⅱ” is a fast-paced hack & slash featured Action RPG. It tells a tale of both the super-power war and the friendship. Our Heroine wields 4 types of weapons and can dynamically switch between them at will.

name: Everyday Baseball VR
description:
Everyday Baseball VR is a VR baseball game which is based in real baseball. 
 
We've been continuously mulling over how to improve convenience without losing realism so that people can easily play our game whether they are familiar with baseball or not.

name: Family Man
description: Family Man is a first-person story-led RPG that asks the question: When pushed to the limits of your own morality, how far would you go for the sake of your family?

name: Nutrients for Life
description: A Virtual Reality Experience to learn about applying nutrients to your crop!

name: Papercraft
description: "Papercraft is an independent game that beautifully combines Rouguelike, TBS and DBG elements. Heroes from legends holding different cards battle in TBS style. How to play the game is entirely up to you."

developers.name: Shenzhen Tanyu Interactive Entertainment Co., Ltd.

name: Wandering Owl
description: Hardcore 2D platformer about the little Owl, which will check your persistence. Complete the Wandering Owl will not be easy, but it's possible if you will try hard. You got the chance to try and finish our game with the least amount of deaths.

name: Three Kingdoms 2019
description: Sin descripción

name: Mio Garden
description: Take a break from reality. Mio Garden offers up a calming Virtual Reality experience unlike any other. Interact with a series of mini games or sit down, relax and meditate against the backdrop of a never-ending sunset.

name: Mad Tower Tycoon
description: Design your own skyscraper with more than 100 Floors. Rent offices, apartments or shops and build a financially lucrative skyscraper. Build cinemas, bars or a theater to satisfy your visitors and create an effective transport system with elevators and stairs.

name: Rocket of Whispers: Prologue
description: In a chilling cellar below the apocalyptic snow, Fei Lin the witch wakes up from hibernation, and ventures into the forsaken world. Guide her through the process of escaping the cellar, and seeing the changed world for her first time.

name: Love Games
description: Love Games is a new Visual Novel by Hanae Novels. Main character Mr. Stevens found his uncle's computer that may make any dream come true. Mr. Stevens is in love with his daughter's friend Mikayla. Enjoy the story and find out what kind of dreams Mr. Stevens wants to come true.

name: Yumori Forest
description: Yumori Forest is a violently stylish action game focused on fast-paced combat, chaotic boss fights and unforgiving difficulty.

name: ChromaSquares
description: A Match-3 style puzzle game.

name: Simplex Mundi
description:
Your spaceship shattered on an unknown alien planet. 
All around you there are harmful robots. 
Will you find a way out? 
 
Explore a stunning world full of dangers in this unique FPS and fight for your survival!

name: The End of the Sun
description: The End of the Sun is a first-person exploration and adventure story-based game, embedded in the Slavic world. This is a series of mysterious events that ordinary people dealt with, as they were living in a small village where the line between myth and reality became to fade perilously.

name: DareSora: Tears for an Unknown Sky
description: "We know of no creature more selfish than humans." How far would you go if your soul was on the line? Find out now in Volume One of DareSora!

name: Tiny Battle Simulator
description: Manage a squad of rebels you recruit on the way. Scavenge weapons, shields and helmets from the sectors you liberate and free the country of evil oppressors. If you like turn based strategy games with pixel art graphics and silly humor, then this game is for you!

name: Nine Noir Lives
description: Stretch your legs, clean your whiskers, and dive into “Nine Noir Lives”. Enjoy a classic point-and-click adventure game, full of humour, crazy characters, and intriguing locations. Solve challenging puzzles and answer the immortal question: how many things need to be licked to solve a murder in this town?

name: Telefrag VR
description: Telefrag VR is a hellishly fast-paced shooter with visceral movement and combat mechanics. Dash, shoot, and teleport around unique arenas that feature impossible geometry where there is no right side up and death can come from any direction.

name: World's Greatest Cities Mosaics
description: Amazing animated nonograms!

name: Crime Girl
description: Crime Girl has one dream: to own every emerald in the world, by hook or by crook. Use the grappling gun and help her make her dreams come true by raiding the abandoned towers of London, now full of ghosts and emeralds! Hooray for crime!

name: Wintermoor Tactics Club
description: Wintermoor Tactics Club is a story about surviving high school, with gameplay inspired by tactics RPGs and visual novels.

name: Entre-Deux: Cursed
description: 3 short stories, written in Ren’py, with choices and various endings. The world of Medocorilia and the adventures of Elrica, Denis, Jesabel and Manolita.

name: Gladio
description: Gladio is a small, experimental game attempting to innovate first person melee combat systems.

name: Cube Full of Mines
description: Mastered the art of finding mines? Ready for a new challenge? We've taken the classic game and given it a new twist. Drive your sense of direction mad as you scramble to find all the things that go boom in the fastest time you can by taking on a Cube Full of Mines!

name: Click and Manage Tycoon
description:
Click and Manage Tycoon is a clicker and management game!
Welcome to our sweet world, become a good manager here!

name: Desert Rescue
description:
《Desert Rescue》 is a third-person shooting game, Desert scene, high-precision model; May use the gun kind weapon, the sword, the hand thunder; The main task is to protect friendly forces and themselves, eliminate zombies, aliens, enemy troops; This game is a single-player shooting adventure survival game, detailed picture, realistic model, find friends, supplies, weapons in the desert, exterminate the enemy struggle to survive! 
WASD controls movement, 
F talk, pick up objects, etc. 
Left mouse button shooting 
Right-click aiming 
Switch weapons with The mouse wheel

name: I <3 You!
description: Hello, stranger! Whoever you are, I do not care – I made this game for myself. Cassiopea is an AI that is created by me. She does not know a single thing about this world; you are free to teach her anything, and the outcome will be the direct result of your personal qualities. It’s easy to know a man by looking at how they deal with someone who can’t fight back. Good luck.

name: Little Arena
description: Little Arena is an action-RPG with the opportunity to create your own character build. Think tactically, choose your talents wisely, to complete the game you will have to die more than once while finding a better strategy for the battle.

name: Kingpin Royale
description: Welcome to the streets of Kingpin Royale, a drug selling strategy game that puts you in the throne as kingpin!

name: Where Humans Shouldn't Go
description: Controlling a survivor of a spacial station explosion, make your way to Earth, jumping holes, running and avoiding obstacles and shooting in challenging enemies and bosses.

name: IQ Test
description: Free Visual IQ Test. One of the tests for the level of intelligence is the Raven test - method of testing IQ, developed in 1936 by J.. Raven

name: Hentai Battlegrounds
description: A group of girls fighting for their lives on the majestic Tentacle Island.

name: Robikon
description:
Did you imagine the life of a robot ? 
If not, then go through this game in which everything is not as easy as you think. 
And you will see with your own eyes how robots cope with difficulties.

name: Hanz!
description: Fight with crowds of enemies, repel attacks with turrets, defeat invulnerable bosses in the new top-down shooter Hanz!

name: Sabreurs - A Noble Duel
description: Sabreurs - A Noble Duel is a local 2-player fencing game about two noblemen settling their disagreement. Maybe someone insulted the other's mother, wronged their family or doubted their noble upbringings. But that doesn't matter - for it is time to settle this by a duel!

name: Jar Sam
description: Jar Sam is a captivating adventure in more than 40 different levels full of puzzles. Get various colours, change the gravity and teleport to unexpected places - you'll find it in this pixel classic two-dimensional puzzle.

name: Ink Plane
description:
Short arcade game drawn and coded by Artur Petrov. 
You have to fight the pirates in the air, sea and land.

name: Mortal Royale
description:
Mortal Royale is a battle royale game on a massive scale in a fantasy setting.
Up to 1000 players are thrown into a massive world in the eye of a deadly chaotic storm that is slowly closing in on them.
Find and tame mounts to give you not only speed but a powerful advantage on the battlefield.
Scavenge the lands for armor, weapons,bows and powerful magic to execute the unworthy and stand as the final surviving champion when the storms finally ends.

name: Enter the Moon
description:
Explore the moon in breathtaking real-time 3D.
Explore his geological aspects.
Battle against spaceships or a secret lunar base.
Enter the ISS.
Measure the moon.
And get in the cockpit.

name: MeatPossible: Chapter 1.5
description: MeatPossible: Chapter 1.5 is a fast-paced, intense, endless side-scrolling flyer action arcade game which depicts the tragical events taking place in the outskirts of the Kingdom of Epicton. Fight in this epic aerial adventure against the Pigs and the Flies as you bring back peace to your Kingdom.

name: Hidden Animals: Photo Hunt
description: Discover what it feels like to be a wildlife photographer chasing both common and completely unfamiliar animals in remote corners around the world! Search for them on striking and realistic 360-degree panoramas with 3D visual effects.

name: Final Hope
description: To the end of the world as the background, the real battle royale game.Each battlefield can hold up to 500 players at the same time.The original version was launched in 2012.In 2018, the new - [Death Editon] was launched on Steam.

name: Tasty Shame in Silver Soul!
description: Welcome, the newcomer! We are glad to see you in the Silver Soul academy - the place where you can embody all your passionate dreams.

name: Bombjour
description: Blow up buildings like never before!

name: Dead Prison
description:
The virus has plunged the world into crisis, and humanity is already on the brink of survival. 
You'll be able to fend off a steady stream of zombies in the game until Dr. Wilson gets through the retreat. As time goes on, more and more powerful monsters will be alarmed. Can you finish the task?

name: Eve of Souls: Static Pod
description: A hardcore pixel horror game with a twist. Guide our lovely maiden though this space filled with horror, where you'll find yourself emerged in the story line. Maybe, you have become her? Or is she becoming you?

name: BingoBango
description: Start your way to be unstoppable, Jump jump and jump! Just keep jumping and you will be unstoppable.

name: CandySnake 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Kontrakt
description: Kontrakt is a hyper-violent action-adventure game about schizophrenia with a dark and twisted story. You will assume the role of a hitman involved in mysterious contract killing, while uncovering the dirty truth and secrets behind the City of Light.

name: Ozapell Mystery Text Adventure
description: A retro early 1980s text adventure experience involving a murder mystery that is generated differently each time the game is played.

name: Conjure Strike
description:
Get ready to compete in the ultimate VR battle arena: Conjure Strike is the team-based VR shooter you’ve been waiting for. 
 
Take part in epic objective based matches, where you will play one of 6 unique classes, each with their own arsenal of special abilities and weapons.

name: Ghostship Chronicles
description: Prepare for the Fight of your life with our fun and challenging Sci-Fi first person and third person shooter. Fun, horror and lots of enemies await aboard the Ghostship with random loot, enemies, and challenges.

name: Rabbit of Destiny
description: The brave little rabbit decided to save the forest and its inhabitants. Equipped with a dagger and a pistol, he went to the edge of the forest where green goo spills out of broken barrels.

name: Thibalryn
description:
A little ball in an ever-expanding labyrinth.
A challenging, old school game with discoveries and bosses in an all new 8-bit themed world.

name: Prime & Load: 1776
description: Set in the American Revolution, Whigs & Tories lets you fight in realistic massive multiplayer battles across New England.

name: Kyiv: From Dusk till Dawn with Lenovo Explorer
description: VR-tour "Kyiv from dusk till dawn" includes:6 locations More than 20 minutes of video content Interactive games in every location Full immersive application Prizes

name: Burning Instinct
description: This game is about the journey of a dragon, beginning right from the start: Popping out of the egg! As a baby dragon, you will encounter many obstacles and difficulties, but as you get more experienced, your dragon gets too! It will learn new abilities, evolve and grow up as you progress!

name: Dark Places
description: Dark Places is a psychological single-player game set in a surreal world filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions. You play as a daemon hunter desperately searching for answers and slowly descends into madness.

name: Clinically Dead
description:
You are dying.
Oxygen level in your brain drastically drops down.
You are seeing all your life, flashing before your eyes.
You are no longer on earth. You are unconscious.
For everyone else this is the matter of seconds, but for you this is taking forever.

name: Mard
description: You are a detective who decides to visit your late father's cabin, which he has left you, somewhere in the woods of northern Sweden. But everything is not what it seems. Determined to find out what drove your father to spend his final months in isolation in the cabin, you set out to investigate.

name: Steven the Sperm
description: Take control of Steven, a sperm who must survive deadly spermicide on his way to the egg! Swim, dash, and squirm through 6 stages of action and thrills! Can you make it to the egg?

name: Live Armor
description: Ruthless tank fights, explosions, sudden clashes with the enemy, which will require from you a lightning-fast reaction and quick, effective actions.

name: Caveman adventures
description: Caveman adventures is here with lots of action and excellent features for your adventures, it will keep you and your child glued to the device!

name: Pirate Island Rescue
description: Help swashbuckling stowaway Penelope save the day and defeat the dastardly pirate Captain Black Beard and his crew of scruffy ruffians. Pirate Island Rescue is a 2D action platform adventure where you rescue captives, defeat pirates and collect treasure before boarding ship to the next island.

name: Lucifer's Forest
description: Lucifer's Forest is a first person survival horror game created in unreal engine 4. Not much more than your typical slender man rip off, but there's a little something extra for you at the end...

name: Swag & Sorcery
description: Build your own fantasy village, create and equip your characters and send them to collect swag in Swag and Sorcery - a new streamlined RPG from the creators of Punch Club and Graveyard Keeper

name: The Twelve Trials
description: Face off against some of the greatest heroes of your age when you are called by the gods to participate in their twelve trials. Coming from humble origins, and hailing from a tiny farming village, you will have to prove yourself worthy of godhood.

name: Nuclear Powered Toaster
description: In the 24th century, you must unravel a sinister plan with spaceships, blasters, and the world's oldest janitor in this absurd sci-fi tale!

name: Tiska Buska
description: Fight for redemption through the eyes of Mahkklen, a mysterious figure in search of vengeance in this world of dishonesty and tiranny, this action packed unseen combination of adventure and racing games offers you 9 levels of pure intrigue and danger, each one with a different new challenge!

name: Defending Camelot
description: Defending Camelot is a tower defense video game, similar to Plants vs. Zombies, developed for PCs and consoles. The game involves Arthur who use a variety of different warriors to prevent an army of monsters from entering Camelot.

name: Money Master
description:
Best for all ages, the typical monopoly game for the whole family.
1-5 people can play on the same computer.
Throw your dice, Come to an interesting monopoly game.

name: Type Fighter
description:
Type Fighter is a game of typing words to perform actions. Stay alive and run as far as you can.

Run, type, kill, die, repeat.

name: Legend of Assassin: Jungle
description: An interesting platform game about the adventures of an assassin in the distant jungle. Go through the levels and collect crystals. And try not to die!

name: Alien Invaders
description: Alien Invaders brings you the possibilitie of reviving one of the best and most old videogame experiences in the history, play as a pilot of space shit to defeat the aliens. Play alone or with friends as local coop. And it also prepares you to fight against the aliens instead of crying scared, you can read more about this inside.

name: Epic roll
description: Epic roll is a videogame with a retro style and a challenging gameplay. You will need to conduct your cube throght a board to get to the maximum distance possible, trying to beat your best scores will be a nice challenge! This may seem a simple game, but you can read more about his philosophy and meaning here.

name: Break the Blocks
description: Break the blocks is a simple but very enjoyable game for all the people that want to experience a retro videogame experience while they have lots of fun.

name: Greeng 2D Dungeon
description: Indie game based on completing dungeons with an easy and simple gameplay and a special time concept. Dungeons will be generated randomly, allowing the players to generate infinite random dungeons and choose their favorite to play. Complete tasks and be stuck, something many will feel identified with

name: Bikini Heaven
description: Bikini Heaven is a relaxing sliding puzzle game for mature gamers.

name: Infinite road
description: Infinite road is a simple but difficult game that will challenge even the most experience players. Move the road to allow the character evade the obstacles and get to the maximun distance possible.

name: Bolsomito
description:
Bolsomito was a 2D beat 'em up where you control a character that resembles the then Brazilian presidential candidate, Jair Bolsonaro, and needs to "defeat the communistic evils and be the hero that will free the nation from misery by facing many kinds of enemies that intend to establish a criminal ideological dictatorship in the country."

The game was delisted after the Public Ministry of the Federal District and Territories opened an investigation against the developers and requested Valve Corporation to cease all sales and "identify and qualify those responsible for BS Studios".

name: Pass the wall
description: Pass the wall is an indie casual game that has the perfect balance between a good and fun gameplay but also challenging and with increasing difficult.

name: Mushroom rain
description: Is a game in the style of "clicker". In the woods, in rainy weather very well the mushrooms grow, but as we already know mushroom are edible and poisonous. Therefore, you have within 1 minute to collect as many edible mushrooms!

name: Arcane Trials
description: Arcane Trials is a VR fantasy spell casting dungeon adventure. Only the most skillful and competent wizards will conquer the final trials. Dodge, fireball, punch, light and blast your way through the increasingly challenging depths. Will you have what it takes become a Master of the Arcane?

name: Rimi Action RPG
description: Rimi Action RPG is a sandbox game based in an Action RPG enviroment. You have a open map guided by missions, and you have the freedom to choose what you want to do. You can play two different characters. Perfect game for otakus or RPG lovers, you can read further.

name: Scarlet Smiling Skull
description: Scarlet Smiling Skull is a unique visual novel with stylized visual, relate-able topics, and meaningful choices!

name: Parkour Polygon
description: Dodge hazards, climb walls, and kick off of signs in your rush to the flag! Parkour Polygon delivers a 2D parkour experience with a striking minimalist style.

name: BreakHack
description: BreakHack is a casual roguelike intended to provide entertainment for 10-30 minutes when you are taking a break from anything else in your life.

name: Rebound VR
description: Rebound VR is a fun and absorbing mix of racquetball and breakout-style gameplay. 42 levels give hours of gameplay. Great stressbuster! Suitable for all ages.

name: Loathing Heart
description:
In this psychological, emotional experience you have to protect your heart from getting harmed. 
Doing so will evolve a short but impactful story around yourself, the protagonist our social system and the way we interact with other people.

name: PD Ultraman Link
description:
PD Ultraman Link is a falling-block puzzle game featuring the Japanese superhero Ultraman and many of his allies and foes. Blocks of various colors fall into the well in pairs; each block has two connections, and connecting three or more blocks together regardless of color will cause them to disappear. Any blocks above the ones removed will fall into the now-open space, potentially creating chain combos which will send garbage blocks that must be cleared twice to the opponent. Additionally, connecting four blocks of the same color will clear all blocks of that color from the board, while connecting four each of a different color together will clear all the garbage blocks on the screen by one stage. If the blocks stack past the line at the top of the well, that player loses the match.

The game includes a single-player story mode, as well as a free battle mode against the computer or another player. There are 10 different characters to choose from: five Ultra Heroes and five aliens.
